title: Ep 61 | Jase's Elaborate Plan to Set the Mood and 4 Words You Should NEVER Say to Your Wife
description:
In one of the funniest episodes yet, Jase reveals the secret to creating a little extra passion in your marriage with his VERY detailed guide to redneck romance. Phil weighs the relative merits of sex and popcorn and wonders if Jase has some "Millennial tendencies." And Al explains that men are microwaves and women are ovens. The guys also tackle a great listener question about righteous anger.
